00001 #include "ros/ros.h"
00002 #include "last_letter/c_drag_a.h"
00003 #define _USE_MATH_DEFINES
00004 #include "math.h"
00005 
00006 bool c_drag_a_callback(last_letter::c_drag_a::Request &req, last_letter::c_drag_a::Response &res)
00007 {
00008         double alpha = req.alpha;
00009         double c_drag_p, c_lift_0, c_lift_a, oswald, b, S, AR;
00010         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_drag_p",c_drag_p);
00011         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_lift_0",c_lift_0);
00012         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_lift_a",c_lift_a);
00013         ros::param::getCached("/world/oswald",oswald);
00014         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/b",b);
00015         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/s",S);
00016         AR = pow(b,2)/S;
00017         res.c_drag_a = c_drag_p + pow(c_lift_0+c_lift_a*alpha,2)/(M_PI*oswald*AR);
00018 
00019         return true;
00020 }
00021 
00022 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00023 {
00024         ros::init(argc, argv, "c_drag_a_server");
00025         ros::NodeHandle n;
00026 
00027         ros::ServiceServer service = n.advertiseService("c_drag_a",c_drag_a_callback);
00028         ROS_INFO("c_drag_a_server ready");
00029         ros::spin();
00030 
00031         return 0;
00032 }
